author: joerg
msg: build.archive-sources renamed to include.sources-in-jars to match our naming scheme and added to build.properties

author: vgritsenko
msg: Add tidy.properties file, can be used by HTMLGenerator / HTMLTransformer.
Properties file contains complete list of jTidy properties with defaults.

author: danielf
msg: Added the possiblity to have an id attribute to the form widget.

author: danielf
msg: Added XMLAdapter which populates a form from XML and serialize a form from XML without needing any binding description. Also added samples for the XML binding.

author: cziegeler
msg: Apply patch (bug 27066) to fix some memory leaks in the tree processor.
